com.stefanbrenner.droplet.service
Interface IDropletMessageProtocol

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArduXposureMessageProtocol, DropletMessageProtocol, SimpleMessageProtocol
public interface IDropletMessageProtocol

Service Interface for the droplet message protocol.

Author:
Stefan Brenner
